events.message: Customer has submitted a claim reporting a car accident that occurred on a busy city street.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident after verifying the incident involved a vehicle collision.
An insurance agent was assigned to the case to manage communications and next steps for the car accident claim.
Acknowledgement of the claim was sent to the customer, confirming receipt and next stages in the process.
Request made to the customer for accident photos, police report, and vehicle repair estimates for assessment.
Customer provided requested documents including pictures of the damaged vehicle and the official police accident report.
Investigation team began reviewing all documentation and gathering further evidence regarding the collision circumstances.
Investigation concluded with confirmation that the accident liability was clearly assigned to the third party involved.
A fair settlement offer was proposed to the customer covering repairs and related expenses from the auto accident.
The customer responded positively to the settlement offer and expressed satisfaction with the processing speed.
Claim approval was granted following acceptance of settlement terms by the customer for the reported car accident.
Payment disbursement was completed, transferring the agreed funds to the customerâ€™s account promptly.
The auto accident claim was officially closed after successful payment and no further issues from the customer.
All case files, documentation, and communications were archived following closure of the accident claim.
